short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically refreshes the current tab at specified intervals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AutoReloadPro: Experience the next level of browsing efficiency with AutoReloadPro. This ingenious extension takes the hassle out of keeping tabs refreshed by automatically updating them at intervals you specify. Whether you're monitoring real-time data, following live events, or simply staying updated on your favorite websites, AutoReloadPro ensures you're always viewing the freshest content without interruption.

No more constantly hitting the refresh button or worrying about missing out on crucial updates. With AutoReloadPro, you can set it and forget it, letting the extension do the work for you. This means more time focusing on what matters to you, whether it's work, research, or simply enjoying your online activities.

Designed with user convenience in mind, AutoReloadPro offers a seamless browsing experience like no other. Its intuitive interface makes customization a breeze, allowing you to tailor refresh intervals to suit your specific needs. Plus, with its lightweight design, AutoReloadPro won't slow down your browsing experience or consume excess resources.

Stay ahead of the curve and never miss a beat with AutoReloadPro. Install now and unlock a world of effortless browsing, where staying up-to-date is as easy as a single click
